sentences.english: Cool down ; there's no need to lose your temper over such a trivial matter.
sentences.chinese: 冷静些，没有必要为如此区区小事而大动肝火。

sentences.english: He was treating the whole thing as a joke.
sentences.chinese: 他把整个事情当作区区小事。

sentences.english: We all believe it no good quarrelling over such trifles.
sentences.chinese: 咱们都以为位这类区区小事口角没有好处。

sentences.english: Don't make a fuss about such trifles.
sentences.chinese: 不要为区区小事而大惊小怪。

sentences.english: You need not worry over such a matter.
sentences.chinese: 你无需为区区小事而忧虑。

definition: lit. the exertion of lifting one's hand (idiom)/fig. a very slight effort
how could one dare?/I don't deserve such praise
lit. your honored carriage/your highness/honored Sir (also sarcastic)/you
to mind/to brood over/to be concerned about
lit. I'm ashamed and dare not (accept the honor); fig. I do not deserve your praise./You flatter me too much.
to inconvenience/to trouble (sb with a request)
to not deserve (one's good fortune etc)
lit. I dare not (accept the honor); fig. I don't deserve your praise/you flatter me
to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/vexation/inconvenience
